channel.title: TaiwanPlus - Latest News
channel.description: Your source of news, culture, and infotainment from Taiwan, a voice of freedom in Asia.

item.title: Taiwan Passes Amendment to Nationality Act, Easing Path to Naturalization
item.description: Foreign nationals deemed "high-level" professionals can now apply for Taiwan citizenship after two years' residence.

item.title: Taiwan's High Mountain Railway Expected To Return to Service in July
item.description: After suffering damage in 2009, a historic railway and tourist attraction is returning to service after undergoing repairs for the past decade and a half.

item.title: Taoyuan City Government, Taipower at Odds Over Long String of Power Outages
item.description: Taoyuan City has seen almost daily power outages this year, but state-run energy company Taipower says they're all isolated incidents.

item.title: Taiwan Toughens Rules on Storing Dangerous Materials in Factories
item.description: Factory owners in Taiwan who don't honestly declare dangerous substances in storage will face higher fines.
